body:
Comment 3: 
Comments such as "TODO(rsc): Fix file format instead of this workaround." in
cmd/link/scan.go suggest that the file format will be subject to change.

Including goobj in the standard library before the file format is finalized could result
in workarounds that cannot be fixed because of the API promise. I suggest to place the
goobj package in the go.tools repository or something similar, so that it can still be
used by others.
